articles.title: Kansas abortion vote recount by hand approved, despite 165,000 margin
articles.description: A Kansas resident Melissa Leavitt's request to recount the abortion vote, citing that she had "seen data," was upheld. But she must pay a $200,000 bond.
articles.content: The recent Kansas vote to allow abortion in the state is to be recounted by hand after a civilian request, even though there was a 165,000-vote difference in favor of allowing abortion, AP reports. … [+1758 chars]

articles.description: It's been an eventful three years for Amazon founder Jeff Bezos and his girlfriend, TV host and helicopter pilot Lauren Sanchez.

articles.author: Paola Rosa-Aquino
articles.title: Climate-fueled droughts are unearthing unexpected discoveries
articles.description: Across the world, severe droughts made worse by climate change are revealing old sites, ancient artifacts, and even human remains.
articles.content: This year, intense droughts, made worse by climate change, have depleted water levels in rivers, lakes, and streams around the world, revealing remnants from the past. As the world warms, experts say… [+5040 chars]
